name: the man from the backyard
description:
your a 18 year old boy and you have to watch someone's house but then a scary rent killer tries to kill you and you have to survive.

feel free to leave a comment and rate my game.

you can follow me than you never miss a new game.

part 2 coming soon! controls
  • WASD to move
  • E to interact
  • LEFT mouse button to shoot
how to install
  1. download the game
  2. extract the game
  3. open the folder
  4. click on themanfromthebackyard.exe
  5. have fun with playing :)
